h1: Rank higher in search results corresponding to buyerâ€™s keywords
p: Keyword advertising gives you strategic positioning on WorldTradeX.com, both on the website and on the mobile application. Your products will be ranked next, after the sponsored product.
In addition to strategic positioning, keyword advertising also offers effective targeting. Businesses are only ranked based on search queries relating to their product category.

h1: Only pay when a buyer clicks on your product
p: Another advantage of using keyword advertising on WorldTradeX.com is that you only pay when a buyer clicks on your product. As a result, you won't be required to pay for a service that you didn't use.

h1: Complete discretion over how you direct your ad spending
p: The keyword advertising tool on WorldTradeX.com enables you to meet your advertising needs within your set spending limit. This implies that you have a choice over how much money you spend on advertising.
